message.entry: Invalid parameter name and value pair. 'DimensionRatio' value must be in the form [a b ; c d], such that c/d >= a/b.
Values must be non-decreasing and of the form [Min,Max].
{0} must be a numeric vector or a function handle.
Expected input to be of size {0}.
Invalid input argument passed. Expected additional input to be either Scale, DimensionRatio or targetSize.
Scale or DimensionRatio is not specified at the input.
Expected input must be a 2-element vector or a 3-element vector where the third element represents channel.
Invalid selection function specified for {0}. Specify a handle to a function that takes no inputs and returns one nonnegative number.
Selection function for {0} yielded an invalid value.
